text: (lighthearted music)

- [Narrator] What can
robotic process automation
mean for your business?

In the IBM Robotic Process
Automation low-code studio,
you can build software robots or bots
that accomplish repetitive tasks for you,

so you can tackle the
most important stuff.

Build bots that automatically
perform step-by-step functions
the same way you do.
Bots can work with you to complete a task.

Like document scanning,
file saving, generating,
and emailing reports,

or navigating between
desktop and web applications.
Or they can work with no intervention,
starting up on their own
and completing a task without your help.

RPA is best-suited for
tasks that are repetitive,

have well-defined rules
and known exceptions

for the bots to follow and
don't change too often.
Machine learning, artificial intelligence,

and process mining also
help bots overcome obstacles
in complex automation scenarios.

IBM Robotic Process Automation
accelerates productivity
by providing a centralized tool
for building and managing bots

with a native, AI-enabled
digital assistant
that can chat with people

to provide end-to-end
assistance or customer service.

Imagine doing more, faster,
with less manual effort.

That's what IBM RPA
means for your business.
(lighthearted music)
